channel.title: Lovecraftseque 2e Playtest - New Journey Into Darkness (one-shot) - Saturday 23rd October
channel.description:
A GMless storytelling game of brooding cosmic horror. The story of a lone Witness at the mercy of strange and terrifying events.
All access time: 26th September 2021 Link: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mk9tv6GW-eye_o0GPZ8
